SELECT mfgs.group_price AS groupPrice, mfgs.`group_price_proportion` AS groupPriceProportion, mfgs.`id`, gs.`specification` FROM `marketing_group_good_specification` mfgs LEFT JOIN good_specification gs ON gs.id = mfgs.`good_specification_id` WHERE mfgs.marketing_group_good_list_id = #{marketingGroupGoodListId} AND mfgs.del_flag = '0' AND gs.`del_flag` = '0'
ORDER BY free_price ASC
